scripts.start:win: powershell -Command "$envVars = Get-Content ../.env | Where-Object { $_ -match '^REACT_APP_NAVER_MAP_CLIENT_ID=' }; foreach($line in $envVars){ $kv=$line.Split('='); [System.Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($kv[0], $kv[1]) }; npm run start:base"
scripts.build:win: powershell -Command "$envVars = Get-Content ../.env | Where-Object { $_ -match '^REACT_APP_NAVER_MAP_CLIENT_ID=' }; foreach($line in $envVars){ $kv=$line.Split('='); [System.Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($kv[0], $kv[1]) }; npm run build:base"
